bwwExcerpt: Colin Quinn is not trying to bring back the ethnic joke, is he? Please, he's much too deep and smart for that, right? And yet, there is a nostalgia -- better, an exasperated, irritated wistfulness -- in his shaggy, fast-moving new 65-minute solo show "Colin Quinn: The New York Story," which contends that false civility has led to "eggshell walking" and homogenized identities.
